record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask unanimous consent there be a period of morning business with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
